Public NotInheritable Class ObservableCounter(Of T) Inherits ObservableInstrument(Of T)
type ObservableCounter<'T (requires 'T : struct)> = class inherit ObservableInstrument<'T (requires 'T : struct)>
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic ref class ObservableCounter sealed : System::Diagnostics::Metrics::ObservableInstrument<T>

Docs.typeparam: The type that the observable counter represents.
Docs.summary: Represents a metrics-observable instrument that reports monotonically increasing values when the instrument is being observed, for example, CPU time (for different processes, threads, user mode, or kernel mode). Call to create the observable counter object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This class supports only the following generic parameter types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, and <xref:System.Decimal>.

Docs.summary: Fetches the current measurements being tracked by this observable counter.
Docs.returns: The current measurements being tracked by this observable counter.
